author: Ramya Kannan
title: One more patient discharged
description: Patient no. 3, the young student who returned from Dublin and tested positive on March 20, was discharged on Tuesday, and asked to stay under home quarantine for 28 days, Health Minister C. Vijayabask
content:
Patient no. 3, the young student who returned from Dublin and tested positive on March 20, was discharged on Tuesday, and asked to stay under home quarantine for 28 days, Health Minister C. Vijayabaskar told The Hindu on Friday. 
The 21-year old is the secon… [+1122 chars]
